Title: The Hairdresser's Husband
Actors: Jean Rochefort, Anna Galiena, Roland Bertin, Maurice Chevit
Plot: Twelve-year-old Antoine falls profoundly in love with a voluptuous but suicidal hairdresser, a formative experience he never forgets. Much later in life, he seeks to repeat his romance by marrying Mathilde - also voluptuous and also a hairdresser - with whom he forms an intimate and consuming relationship in an attempt to blot out the miseries of this world from their lives.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 7 nominations.
Production: Centre National de la Cinematographie, Lambart Productions, TF1 Films Productions
